code:
class D LinkedList:
def __init__(self):
self.head = None

def append(self, data):
new\_node = Node(data)
if not self.head:
self.head = new\_node
return
curr = self.head
while curr.next:
curr = curr.next
curr.next = new\_node
new\_node.prev = curr

class Node:
def **init**(self, data):
self.data = data
self.next = None
self.prev = None

def flatten\_d\_linked\_list(head):
if not head or not head.next:
return head
head\_next = head.next
while head\_next:
if head\_next.next:
head\_next = merge(head, head\_next)
else:
break
return head

def merge(list1, list2):
list1\_temp = list1
list2\_next = list2.next
list2.next = None
list1.next = list2
list2.prev = list1
list2\_next.prev = None
return list1\_next

def display(head):
curr = head
while curr:
print(curr.data, end=" <-> ")
curr = curr.next
print("None")

dll = D LinkedList()
dll.append(1)
dll.append(2)
dll.append(3)
dll.append(4)
dll.append(5)
dll.append(6)

root = dll.flatten\_d\_linked\_list(dll.head)
dll.display(root)
prompt: Flatten a multilevel doubly linked list yaz.
